full_description: Starting from blocks on {A} and {B}, cycle them through the empty pad {C} sequentially.
schema: {A} notifies pad 0, {B} notifies pad 1, {C} notifies pad 2, {a} notifies the left arm, {b} notifies the right arm
preference: num of words should not exceed 15. Degree of detail avg is six.
seen: Move blocks from {A} and {B} to the empty pad {C} in sequence.
Cycle blocks starting on {A} and {B} through {C} using both arms.
Shift blocks from {A} and {B} into the vacant pad {C} repeatedly.
Use {a} and {b} to move blocks from {A} and {B} to {C}.
Beginning at {A} and {B}, rotate blocks to the free pad {C}.
Pick blocks from {A} and {B} to fill the empty spot {C}.
Transfer blocks initially on {A} and {B} to the unoccupied pad {C}.
Relocate blocks from {A} and {B} to {C} to start the cycle.
Start with blocks at {A} and {B}, then move them to {C}.
Use {a} or {b} to cycle blocks from {A} and {B} via {C}.
Shift the block on {B} to {C}, then move from {A} accordingly.
Execute a circular move for blocks on {A} and {B} using {C}.
Rotate blocks from their initial pads {A} and {B} through pad {C}.
Sequentially transfer blocks from {A} and {B} to the next empty pad.
Move blocks from {A} and {B} to the available spot {C} continuously.
Cycle blocks by moving them from {A} and {B} to the vacancy.
Relocate the blocks on {A} and {B} to the unoccupied pad {C}.
Begin the rotation of blocks from {A} and {B} to pad {C}.
Use {a} and {b} to shift blocks from {A} and {B} to {C}.
Starting at pads {A} and {B}, move blocks to the empty {C}.
unseen: Cycle blocks from {A} and {B} into the empty pad {C} to finish.
Move blocks through pads {A}, {B}, and {C} starting from the first two.
Shift blocks from {A} and {B} to the vacant {C} in a loop.
Transfer blocks from their starting pads {A} and {B} to empty spots.
Rotate blocks from {A} and {B} to the next available pad location.
